    Class
    Description
    class 
    wgCriticalSectionSet
    A collection of generated critical sections for a workload task.
    Methods in workloadgenerator that return wgCriticalSection
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    wgCriticalSection
    wgCriticalSectionSet.getCriticalSection(int i)
    Return the wgCriticalSection at the given index.
    wgCriticalSection
    wgCriticalSectionSet.getCriticalSectionUnder(double time, String timeisSorE)
    Find the smallest (innermost) critical section that contains the given time.
    wgCriticalSection
    wgCriticalSectionSet.getCriticalSectionUnder(double time, String timeisSorE, Vector<wgCriticalSection> csSet)
    Search within a provided csSet for the smallest critical section enclosing time.
    wgCriticalSection
    wgCriticalSectionSet.getCriticalSectionUnder(wgCriticalSection wgCS)
    Find one critical section that is directly above the given wgCriticalSection in the nesting hierarchy (i.e., the smallest parent).
    Methods in workloadgenerator that return types with arguments of type wgCriticalSection
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Vector<wgCriticalSection>
    wgCriticalSectionSet.getCriticalSectionSetOn(wgCriticalSection criticalSection)
    Return the set of critical sections that are directly above the provided criticalSection (i.e., its siblings in the parent level).

    wgCriticalSectionSet.addCriticalSection(wgCriticalSection cs)
    Add a critical section to this set and record its resource usage.
    Vector<wgCriticalSection>
    wgCriticalSectionSet.getCriticalSectionSetOn(wgCriticalSection criticalSection)
    Return the set of critical sections that are directly above the provided criticalSection (i.e., its siblings in the parent level).
    wgCriticalSection
    wgCriticalSectionSet.getCriticalSectionUnder(wgCriticalSection wgCS)
    Find one critical section that is directly above the given wgCriticalSection in the nesting hierarchy (i.e., the smallest parent).
    void
    wgCriticalSectionSet.removeCriticalSection(wgCriticalSection cs)
    Remove a critical section from this set and release its resource from the used list.
